definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: On one continent, thousands of people line in square matrix, rushing ahead to kill.
sentences.chinese: 在一塊大陸上，上萬的人排成方陣，彼此衝殺。

sentences.english: When Ren crossed the bridge, he saw Xuande to the left and Yan Yan to the right, both charging toward him.
sentences.chinese: 過了金雁橋，見玄德軍在左，嚴顏軍在右，衝殺將來。

sentences.english: On one land, tens of thousands men ranked and rushed and killed.
sentences.chinese: 在一塊大陸上，上萬的人排成方陣，彼此衝殺。
